ARABIC: نَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْكَ مِن نَّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرْعَوْنَ بِٱلْحَقِّ لِقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We recite to you with truth some news of Musa and Pharaoh for people who have iman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We narrate to you from the history of Moses and Pharaoh in all verity, for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We recount to you with truth some parts of the story of Moses and Pharaoh for the benefit of those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We recite to you some of the story of Moses and the Pharaoh for a genuine purpose, and for the benefit of the believing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We shall narrate to you the true tidings of Moosa and Firaun, for the people who have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We recite to you some of the news of Musa and Fir`awn in truth, for a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We recite to you from the account of Musa and Firon with truth for people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We will recite to thee something of the tiding of Moses and Pharaoh truthfully, for a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We narrate unto thee (somewhat) of the story of Moses and Pharaoh with truth, for folk who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We shall narrate to you some of the story of Moses and Pharaoh, with truth, for people who would believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: WE recite unto thee of the story of Musa and Fir'awn with truth fora people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We relate to you truly some of the account of Moses and Pharaoh for a people who have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We rehearse to thee some of the story of Moses and Pharaoh in Truth, for people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We recite to you some of the news of Musa (Moses) and Fir'aun (Pharaoh) in truth, for a people who believe (those who believe in this Quran, and in the Oneness of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We shall in truth recite to you some of the news of Moses and Pharaoh for a nation who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We narrate to you from the history of Moses and Pharaoh—in truth—for people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We recite to you from the news of Moses and Pharaoh in truth for a people who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:3] We will recount, narrate, to you [something] of the tale of Moses and Pharaoh truthfully, for a people who believe, for their sake, since they are the ones to benefit from such [an account].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We narrate unto thee (somewhat) of the story of Moses and Pharaoh with truth) through the Qur'an, (for folk who believe) in you and in the Qur'an.
